question: What specific circumstances led Vergible Woods to Janie?
answer: Tea Cake (Vergible Woods) came to Janie's store due to a mix-up about a baseball game. He thought the game was being held at Hungerford, so he got a ride to where the road turns off from the Dixie Highway and walked to Eatonville, only to discover the game was actually in Winter Park. Since everyone in town had gone to the game and all the cars were gone, he couldn't get to Winter Park. Finding Janie alone in the store (Hezekiah had asked off to go to the game), he came in to buy cigarettes (Camels) and ended up staying to teach her how to play checkers, which began their relationship.
quote: Dat's 'cause Ah'm dumb. Ah got de thing all mixed up. Ah thought de game was gointuh be out at Hungerford. So Ah got uh ride tuh where dis road turns off from de Dixie Highway and walked over here and then Ah find out de game is in Winter Park.
